multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: equities; S&P 500 likely gains 0.5–1% during the Labor Day sales week as consumer spending surges on discounted electronics and appliances.

category.motivation: The article is a retail promotion listing discounts on Samsung Galaxy Watch 7; it does not fit any of the specified categories.

article_node.title: Snub the Samsung Galaxy Watch FE this Labor Day – the much better Watch7 is just as cheap at Best Buy
article_node.summary: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 7 is heavily discounted for Labor Day, with Best Buy offering the 40 mm Bluetooth‑only model at $199.99 and the 44 mm version at $229.99, while LTE‑enabled variants drop to $249.99 and $279.99 respectively. The article highlights the watch’s solid performance, new AI‑powered wellness features, and the fact that it’s a last‑year model still receiving software updates. It also lists other Labor Day deals across categories such as mattresses, TVs, and appliances, positioning the smartwatch as a bargain for buyers looking for a feature‑rich wearable at a reduced price.
